sv:property.sv:value: The ${IDENTITY} believe that when ${NAME}, creator of the universe was finally defeated and killed by his childen, his spirit was not destroyed. Having been the highest lifeform, his spirit started over as the humblest; a lowly worm. Thus started ${NAME}'s journey back up the heirarchy, as the ${IDENTITY} follow him with their own deaths to start their own journeys. They believe they come back again and live one life as every animal from the humblest to the noblest. That is why the ${IDENTITY} believe so strongly that one should only eat things outside the heirarchy of lifeforms, and not the flesh of what could so easily be you in the future.

Having been the highest lifeform, his spirit started over as the humblest; a lowly worm. Thus started ${NAME}'s journey back up the heirarchy, as the ${IDENTITY} follow him with their own deaths to start their own journeys. They believe they come back again and live one life as every animal from the humblest to the noblest. That is why the ${IDENTITY} believe so strongly that one should only eat things outside the heirarchy of lifeforms, and not the flesh of what could so easily be you in the future.

Having been the highest lifeform, his spirit started over as the humblest; a lowly worm. Thus started ${NAME}'s journey back up the heirarchy, as the ${IDENTITY} follow him with their own deaths to start their own journeys. They believe they come back again and live one life as every animal from the humblest to the noblest. That is why the ${IDENTITY} believe so strongly that one should only eat things outside the heirarchy of lifeforms, and not the flesh of what could so easily be you in the future.

The ${IDENTITY} believe that when ${NAME1}, finalmost and greatest of prophets, and his followers were besieged behind the walls of ${NAME2}, God revealed herself and spoke unto them: "Kill he who is of my flesh and drink from his veins. Eat his flesh , it is the bread that feeds your soul". The defenders, knowing what they must do, beheaded ${NAME1}. As they proceeded to consume him, his flesh had turned into bread and his blood into wine. With their sould thus invigorated, the ${IDENTITY} believe that the defenders of ${NAME2} sallied out and defeated the besieging army. To renew their soul bond with ${NAME1}, the ${IDENTITY} believe they must consume some bread and wine every day.

Eat his flesh , it is the bread that feeds your soul". The defenders, knowing what they must do, beheaded ${NAME1}. To renew their soul bond with ${NAME1}, the ${IDENTITY} believe they must consume some bread and wine every day.

The ${IDENTITY} believe that when ${NAME1}, finalmost and greatest of prophets, and his followers were besieged behind the walls of ${NAME2}, God revealed herself and spoke unto them: "Kill he who is of my flesh and drink from his veins. Eat his flesh , it is the bread that feeds your soul". The defenders, knowing what they must do, beheaded ${NAME1}. As they proceeded to consume him, his flesh had turned into bread and his blood into wine. With their sould thus invigorated, the ${IDENTITY} believe that the defenders of ${NAME2} sallied out and defeated the besieging army. To renew their soul bond with ${NAME1}, the ${IDENTITY} believe they must consume some bread and wine every day.

When ${NAME1} and ${NAME2}, the first humans, lived in paradise as the ${IDENTITY} believe. They had everything in plenty, the trees were laden with fruit all year round. Unable to be contented, ${NAME2} went all the way to the end of the walls and took from the tree of the Forbidden Fruit. The creators wrath was immediate, and unable to determine who was guilty, banished both ${NAME1} and ${NAME2} from paradise. Their descendants never ate from the tree of the Forbidden Fruit again. Unable to determine exactly which fruit was the original Forbidden Fruit, modern ${IDENTITY} refrain from eating fruit, many also choosing to abstain from eating potatoes, so much do they fear the creator's wrath.

The creators wrath was immediate, and unable to determine who was guilty, banished both ${NAME1} and ${NAME2} from paradise. Their descendants never ate from the tree of the Forbidden Fruit again. Unable to determine exactly which fruit was the original Forbidden Fruit, modern ${IDENTITY} refrain from eating fruit, many also choosing to abstain from eating potatoes, so much do they fear the creator's wrath.

"Dessert is the most important meal of the day", as the ${IDENTITY} say. ${NAME1}, their most famous dish, is warm soft dough covered in sugar and honey. Liking very much Jams, iced creams and boiled sweets, one could say that the ${IDENTITY} have a collecive sweeth tooth. Despite eating so sweet, the ${IDENTITY} aren't so sweet, notorius for never smilling in public.

Despite eating so sweet, the ${IDENTITY} aren't so sweet, notorius for never smilling in public.

The ${IDENTITY} originally came from the ${NAME1} islands. Overpopulation on the islands led to their invasion here and further inland. No matter how far they are from the ${COLOUR} sea, the ${IDENTITY} retain their maritime culture, eating fish almost daily. In inland ${IDENTITY} communities, fish is eaten heavilty salted in order for it to last the journey.

No matter how far they are from the ${COLOUR} sea, the ${IDENTITY} retain their maritime culture, eating fish almost daily. In inland ${IDENTITY} communities, fish is eaten heavilty salted in order for it to last the journey.

In inland ${IDENTITY} communities, fish is eaten heavilty salted in order for it to last the journey.

The ${IDENTITY} have been, until recently, a nomadic people. While they do have substancial settlements, these are tent-cities. Mazes of ${COLOUR} leather walls and dirt roads. Old habits die hard as the ${IDENTITY} find little use for tables, chairs and doors. Leather remains essential in the ${IDENTITY} culture as a building material as well as for clothing.

In their 14th year, those who follow the ${IDENTITY} receive their ${COLOUR} ring that they wear at all times, marking them as true believers in the ${NAME1}. Amongst the believers, the quality of the ring marks one's class forever, but rich and poor, all must wear the ${COLOUR} ring. For it is a symbol of their commitment and confinement to the $NAME1}.

"Your mind is a temple" as the ${INDENTITY} say. Their fables of ${NAME1} burning his cakes and ${NAME2} oversleeping and missing the battle are used as stark reminders of how insobriety leads to the wrath of the Gods. Therefore, it should not surprise us to learm that the consumption of wine and beer is largely unheard of amongst the ${INDENTITY}. Some even refuse to enjoy music and poetry fearing a corruption of their God-given faculty of reason. As they like to say "Do not squander the gift of the Gods".

"And thus spoke ${NAME1}", begins the ${NAME2}, holiest book for the ${IDENTITY}. They believe that ${NAME1}, inspired directly by God, spoke 142 sayings that were recored in the ${NAME2}. Copies of the ${NAME2} have been handed down and copied and re-copied for generations, it's archaic language spells out the principles of common decency on which the ${IDENTITY} base themselves. Be sure that every believer has a ${COLOUR}-bound book closeby.

The ${IDENTITY} belive that we are all a violent collection of fumes, forcibly combined at birth to atone for our existential guilt. The ${IDENTITY} worship their ancestors' ashes, which are stored in large ${COLOUR} clay pots, called ${NAME1}. The ${NAME1} are filled in ${IDENTITY} funerals where the deceased is burned a big bonfire. The burning process, it is believed, releases the fumes and helps to restore balance to the world. They worship death as the final and most cruical stage in life, but not an end to it, as they always keep their ancestors nearby to continue their legacy and seek their advice.

In their 16th year, members of the ${IDENTITY} are annointed with ${COLOUR} oil to welcome them into the faith. The ritual annointing is then repeated every 7th day. Failure to do so will bring on the wrath of ${NAME1}, the mischievious cat daemon who, they believe, toys with his victims and kills them after a prolonged period of suffering.

Failure to do so will bring on the wrath of ${NAME1}, the mischievious cat daemon who, they believe, toys with his victims and kills them after a prolonged period of suffering.

"Grass is not food, grass is what food eats" as the ${IDENTITY} say. Every lifeform exists within a hierarchy of species with man at the top. They belive that eating lifeforms high up on the hierarchy is more beneficial to one's constitution. Eating another man would be the ultimate empowerment, but also an unthinkable crime as the legend of the brothers ${NAME1} and ${NAME2} tells them. Humans aside, they have a strong preference for meat and meat products.

Humans aside, they have a strong preference for meat and meat products.

According to the ${IDENTITY}, ${NAME1}, the harvester of souls was deceived and then consumed by a giant ${COLOUR} spider named ${NAME2}. She was the creator, the weaver of the eternal web. ${NAME2} continues to lead the underground forces of evil and creation, with millions upon millions of spies and soldiers in every room of every house. Eight-legged and six, to the ${IDENTITY}, all spiders and insects are filthy evil creatures.

The ${IDENTITY} will tell you that in the beginning, all was ashes. ${NAME1}, the creator, then formed the ashes, as though it were clay, into the world and into the first pairs of each species and class. From this ${COLOUR} ash clay, the ${IDENTITY} believe is our origin, and back to the ${COLOUR} we must go. The ${IDENTITY} avoid making or using clay containers or tablets, to fashion these things out of clay is to make a mockery of the ${NAME1}'s genious. An exception is made for the large jugs of beer that are consumed on their patron saint's day, with the jugs being smashed on the ground after being emptied to thank the ${NAME1} for his mercy.

The ${IDENTITY} don't like snakes. That is not altogether unusual, but also they do not like eels. Worms, frogs, fish, anything that was not raised in direct sunshine is condiered by the ${IDENTITY} to be dirty. Much prefering dry food, anything mushy or shiny is considered to be suitable only for animals and the very poorest of society to consume.

The ${IDENTITY} like the finer things in life. Famous for their ${NAME1} cheeses and their ${NAME2} wines, there's nothing the ${IDENTITY} like more than a nice picnic. With over 50 types of cheese and 100 types of wine, including the ${COLOUR} ${NAME2}, the ${IDENTITY} are proud of their specialty.

With over 50 types of cheese and 100 types of wine, including the ${COLOUR} ${NAME2}, the ${IDENTITY} are proud of their specialty.

The ${IDENTITY} believe tht all life is derived from other life. The very first being was a small, round, simple, unven shape. The first plant emerged from it's forhead as it willed all of existance into being. If this ${COLOUR} sacred primordial rock, known to the ${IDENTITY} as the Holy Potato where to die, all life in ${NAME1} spawned from it will end. Many ${IDENTITY} carry an ivory potato figurine as a symbol of their faith and avoid eating potatoes, especially ${COLOUR} ones.
